name: Veteran Swordbreaker Skeleton
description: A skeletal figure with a haunted presence, equipped with metal weaponry, designed to intimidate foes during combat.
memorable: It can damage weapons that strike it, potentially destroying them.
goals: To serve its master in battle, using its ability to incapacitate enemies' weapons.
relations: May serve under necromancers or other evil beings.
environment: Commonly found in graveyards, battlefields, or haunted ruins.
strengths: High Strength allows for strong melee attacks; multiple attacks and weapon versatility.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to thunder damage, limiting its defenses against such attacks.
attacks: Can make two longsword attacks and additionally attack with a shortsword or crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Fossilized Bones, which damages and potentially destroys weapons that hit it.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and various conditions
Has an Armor Class of 14, enhancing its defense
Possesses high durability with 78 hit points
Can attack both in melee and ranged combat effectively
